tool.doc: Temictli is a trace generator. It will generate a trace from a configuration given as input. The configuration file has the following format. It must be a one-line text file with valuees separated by a ';' and with the values in the following order: typeOfEvent1#typeOfEvent2;NumberOfEventType;NumberOfProducer;NumberOfLeaveProducer; OnlyLeavesProducesEvent(boolean) ; NumberOfEvents. Example: Event#State#Variable;20;101;100;true;1000000
tool.name: Temictli
